channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: College isn’t in the plans for many rural students despite stepped-up recruiting efforts
item.description: America’s rural high school students are less likely to go to college than their urban and suburban peers.

item.title: Senate delays August recess for now as Trump presses for more confirmations
After a reference to Trump’s impeachments is removed from a history museum, complex questions echo
